New Records: Mohammed Shami achieved the best bowling figures in the match with 7 wickets for 57 runs.
Key Match Events: Daryl Mitchell scored 134 runs for New Zealand.
Tim Southee took 3 wickets for 100 runs.
India won the match by 70 runs.
Shami took 7 wickets, including crucial ones of Williamson and Mitchell.
Ferguson hit a six off Shami before getting out, giving Shami his seventh wicket.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma emphasized the importance of staying calm under pressure.
Shami reflected on his performance and the significance of not letting the opportunity slip away.
New Zealand's effort was acknowledged, with credit given to Williamson and Mitchell for their partnership.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India will face the winner of the Australia vs South Africa match in the final.
The match was held at Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai.
